page.title: 15INTERVIEW IN S.HARRIS
page.content: This is part of an interview with MURDO MACDONALD who was born in { {LEVERBURGH}in 1908. {Q}_When did you leave school? {A}_At 14 years of age. {Q}_What work did you do in school? {A}_English, Arithmetic, Geography and Gardening. {Q}_Did you have jotters? {A}_No. We used slates. {Q}_Did you have school dinners? {A}_No. Children took a piece of bread. {Q}_Was the school heated? {A}_No.We had to take a peat to put on the fire. {Q}_How many boats served the Islands? {A}_The Dunara Castle,Hebrides and a small trawler,every ten days. {Q}_What were the buildings on the pier for? {A}_Kipper house,hospital,gutting shed and houses for workers.
